description.displayText: Yamilet (Yami) was with my family for 6 months. She cared for my twins from 6 months to 1 year old. She is flexible, dependable, trustworthy and punctual. Twins can be a handful but Yami made it look easy caring for my girls. They look forward to seeing her everyday! It was clear from day 1 that she loves/enjoys taking care of children. We we're grateful to have someone we can trust wholeheartedly to care for our girls and I am sure she'll continue to be a part of our lives long term.
description.originalText: Yamilet (Yami) was with my family for 6 months. She cared for my twins from 6 months to 1 year old. She is flexible, dependable, trustworthy and punctual. Twins can be a handful but Yami made it look easy caring for my girls. They look forward to seeing her everyday! It was clear from day 1 that she loves/enjoys taking care of children. We we're grateful to have someone we can trust wholeheartedly to care for our girls and I am sure she'll continue to be a part of our lives long term.

Yamilet was a blessing to our family. She was the full time nanny for our twins from the time they came home from the nicu until their first birthday. We call her the baby whisperer because very quickly it was clear that caretaking for children is her gift and passion.  She was always early, excited to care for the kids, and very detail oriented in the kidâ€™s schedule and completion of responsibilities.  She went above and beyond to help keep things organized and spent time helping the twins with their milestones.  As two working professionals, it was a relief to have someone as professional, loving, and passionate as Yamilet caretaking for our twins as if they were family.  We still call on Yamilet for care on nights and weekends when she is available. And, would highly recommend her for anyone looking for a seasoned bi-lingual nanny.

description.displayText: Yamilet is a wonderful caregiver. She watched our newborn son for about a year (before he transitioned to preschool). She is great at making healthy meals for children, providing educational activities for them, and creating a warm bond. In addition, because she's bilingual, we asked her to speak exclusively in Spanish to our son. Often times, we would hire Yamilet for evening and weekends, as well, which she was flexible and able to do.

description.displayText: Yamilet is a nanny of many talents. She has cared for my boys as if they were her own grandson's for 3 years now. They love her a lot! She is a nanny that thrives beyond childcare itself and enjoys bringing order to your home. She takes a lot of pride in her work and is proactive in many household tasks that you never expected her to do - which is always appreciated!
description.originalText: Yamilet is a nanny of many talents. She has cared for my boys as if they were her own grandson's for 3 years now. They love her a lot! description.displayText: Our son immediately took to Yamilet. I highly recommend her. She is very sweet and is willing to help with anything your family may need.
description.originalText: Our son immediately took to Yamilet. I highly recommend her. She is very sweet and is willing to help with anything your family may need.

description.displayText: Yamilet has been our nanny for about a year and a half. She has been the best thing that ever happened to our family! We love her like family! She started with us when my daughter was 4 months old. My daughter absolutely LOVES her!! Yamilet loves and cares for my daughter like she was her own child. When she gets here in the morning, she runs to her and gives her a huge hug and kiss. She takes her to the park, the aquarium, grocery shopping, etc and keeps her very active. She has also taught her Spanish (I'm bilingual). Yamilet cooks, cleans and does laundry for us. Anything around the house that needs to be done, she gets it done. She is fast, effective and never wants to sit around doing nothing. She is always available nights, weekends and we have even gone on vacation and left her with her for a few days. We, unfortunately, are having to part ways due to financial troubles. We are heartbroken! Any family would be SO lucky to have her!  Hire her- you will not regret it!

description.displayText: Yamilet is very professional, diligent and accommodating.  She took care of my special needs daughter for two weeks.  She did exactly as I asked and always wanted to stay busy.  She is superb at housekeeping!
description.originalText: Yamilet is very professional, diligent and accommodating.  She took care of my special needs daughter for two weeks.  She did exactly as I asked and always wanted to stay busy.  She is superb at housekeeping!

description.displayText: My husband and I really enjoyed meeting with Yamilet this evening even though it wasn't a good fit. We truly want a 24/7 live in candidate. She arrived to the interview on time and was very easy to talk with. She speaks spanish and English which is an asset if you want your children to learn another language. She also has good amount of experience.
